description._content: Image taken from: Title: "Gems and Precious Stones of North America. A popular description of their occurrence, value, history, archæology, and of the collections in which they exist, also a chapter on pearls and on remarkable foreign gems owned in the United States. Illustrated, etc" Author: KUNZ, George Frederick. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 7105.ee.14.", "British Library HMNTS 7106.i.12." Page: 109 Place of Publishing: New York Date of Publishing: 1890 Publisher: Scientific Publishing Co. Issuance: monographic Identifier: 002035443 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
